name: JM Smucker Company (The)
title: J.M. Smucker's coffee sales rise on higher realized prices  K-Cup sales

title: Folgers coffee sales volume fell 9 pct in Q1 2016 -J M Smucker Co

title: J.M. Smucker profit up 17.6 pct  helped by lower coffee prices

name: JM Smucker Company (The)

content: NEW YORK  March 10 (IFR) - Moody's Investors Service downgraded US food manufacturer J. M. Smucker by two notches to Baa2 Tuesday on expectations the company's debt-financed acquisition of Big Heart Pet Brands will increase leverage.
name: JM Smucker Company (The)
title: Moody's downgrades JM Smucker ahead of expected bond sale

name: JM Smucker Company (The)
title: Dunkin' Brands' K-Cup packs to be sold online and at retail stores

content: J.M. Smucker Co  said it expected its coffee business to get back on track later this year as bean prices stabilize and the company introduces smaller Folgers cans to win back customers it lost after raising prices.
name: JM Smucker Company (The)
title: J.M. Smucker aims to get coffee business back on track this year

content: Feb 13 J.M. Smucker Co said it expected its coffee business to get back on track later this year as bean prices stabilize and the company introduces smaller Folgers cans to win back customers it lost after raising prices.
name: JM Smucker Company (The)
title: UPDATE 2-J.M. Smucker aims to get coffee business back on track this year

name: JM Smucker Company (The)
title: J.M. Smucker profit falls 3.5 pct on weak coffee demand

content: CHICAGO (Reuters Breakingviews) - J M Smucker's $5.8 billion purchase of Big Heart Pet Brands may keep investor activists in Kibbles 'n Bits. The $11 billion owner of Folgers coffee  Jif peanut butter and eponymous fruit spreads should gain bargaining power with retailers by bundling human treats with dog food. But the odd combination may elicit a Pavlovian response from uppity shareholders.
name: JM Smucker Company (The)
title: Breakingviews: Smucker deal may keep activists in Kibbles 'n Bits

content: J M Smucker Co   the maker of Folgers coffee  said it would buy pet food maker Big Heart Pet Brands  known for brands such as Meow Mix and Milk-Bone  for $3.2 billion to enter the fast-growing pet food market.
name: JM Smucker Company (The)
title: J M Smucker to buy Milk-Bone owner Big Heart Pet Brands

content: J M Smucker Co  has agreed to buy Big Heart Pet Brands for $3.2 billion  snapping up the popular Meow Mix and Milk-Bone brands in its first venture into the fast-growing U.S. pet food market.
name: JM Smucker Company (The)
title: J M Smucker to buy Meow Mix owner in pet food push

content: * Total deal value of about $5.8 bln  including $2.6 bln debt
name: JM Smucker Company (The)

title: J M Smucker to buy Big Heart Pet Brands in $5.8 bln deal
